sources.label: Lotka–Volterra (Predator–Prey) Simulator Explore cyclical dynamics with adjustable α, β, γ, δ parameters.
Island Biogeography Calculator Equilibrium species richness from colonization and extinction rates.
Niche Breadth Calculator Compute Levin’s or Shannon-based niche width from resource use.
Population Pyramid Generator Build age–sex distributions from counts or proportions.
Life Table Calculator lx, qx, ex and survivorship metrics from cohort data.
Fick’s Law of Diffusion Flux through membranes from gradients, area and diffusivity.
River Discharge (Velocity–Area) Q = A·v with section geometry and mean velocity methods.
